name: One Bullet Man (Drentsoft Games Ltd)
description:
Made for TriJam 201 in 45 minutes but unfortunately I missed the cutoff by a few seconds.

Controls

Aim with mouse. Left Click/Space to fire the bullet. Try to get the highest score.

Blue circle = target: Breaks on impact: 20 points

Red circle = bumper:  Bounces Bullet: 5 points

Green Cube = jelly: Slows the bullet down

Credits

Art and Programming: Me
